rules_text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to red and white is less than seven, Iroas isn’t a creature.
Other creatures you control have first strike.
Whenever you attack for the first time each turn, untap all other creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
notes:
RDZ

Spells you cast that target a creature you control cost 2 less to cast and can’t be countered.
You may cast spells as though they had flash if it targets a creature you control. If you do, it costs 2 less to cast and can’t be countered.
